fsrtool.name: chat
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `chat` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `from` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `to` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `message` text NOT NULL, `sent` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `recd` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
